nets.name: Blind Hams Digital Net
nets.description: Weekly net for blind and sighted amateur radio operators to gather and share timely info for the ham community.
nets.location: [Blind Hams Digital Network](https://www.blindhams.network/nets/blind-hams) or see the home page for connection details.

nets.name: Absolute Tech Net
nets.description: A net to discuss technical amateur radio topics and troubleshoot issues faced by hams around the world.

nets.name: Blind Hams Tech Net
nets.description: Monthly technical deep-dive net.
nets.location: [Blind Hams Digital Network](https://www.blindhams.network/nets/blind-hams) or see the home page for connection details.

nets.name: Look At This Net
nets.description: Smart glasses and assistive wearables from a blind/VI perspective, for amateur radio and daily life.
nets.location: [Blind Hams Digital Network](https://www.blindhams.network/nets/blind-hams) or see the home page for connection details.

nets.name: Visually Inconvenienced Hams Net
nets.description: Topical net for all hams from a visually ‘inconvenienced’ angle. Final net of the month highlights weather talk and Q&A. Weather test.
nets.location: [Blind Hams Digital Network](https://www.blindhams.network/nets/blind-hams) or see the home page for connection details.

nets.name: The Sounds Good Net
nets.description: For music fans and musicians, audio nerds and pros — anything to do with music and sound.
nets.location: [Blind Hams Digital Network](https://www.blindhams.network/nets/blind-hams) or see the home page for connection details.

nets.name: Blind Hams Cross Country Net
nets.description: HF net for the Blind Hams community. Check your propagation and talk to other blind hams and friends of the network on HF.

nets.name: Handi Hams Net
nets.description: Weekday net hosted by the [Courage Kenny Handi Hams System](https://www.handihams.org) discussing topics of interest to radio amateurs who have different disabilities.

nets.name: Handi Hams Trivia Net
nets.description: Weekly trivia net hosted by Handi Hams.

nets.name: Sierra Foothills ARC Coffee Break Net
nets.description: Daily ragchew hosted by the Sierra Foothills Amateur Radio Club.
nets.location: [Sierra Foothills Amateur Radio Club Repeater System](https://www.w6ek.org) or AllStar 51018

nets.name: The Friday Night Blind Hams Allstar and Echolink Net
nets.description: Join [KY2D, Jim,  from Maine as he leads an informal check-in / comments net to give Blind and Visually Impaired amateur radio operators a place to hang out on Allstar and Echolink each Friday night.
nets.allstar: blind hams allstar or the KY2D allstar node 2396

nets.name: Amateur Radio Newsline
nets.description: Amateur Radio Newsline™ is a free service to the amateur radio community.  [Amateur Radio Newsline](https://www.arnewsline.org)   produces a weekly audio news bulletin called a “QST” or “bulletin of interest to radio amateurs” that can be heard on the blind hams digital network, or via a podcast download.
nets.allstar: See the [Blind Hams Digital Network](www.blindhamsnetwork) homepage to get the correct AllStar node number for your international region

nets.name: Active Elements Digital Net
nets.description: Weekly UK digital net.

nets.name: All Nodes Net
nets.description: Every Monday at 6:00 PM PT, this net is the place for discussions related to the setup, configuration, and operation of digital nodes and the associated hardware. A great place for noobies and experienced users alike.
nets.location: [Sierra Foothills Amateur Radio Club Repeater System](https://www.w6ek.org) or AllStar 51018

nets.name: Word of God Net
nets.description: Join us Wednesdays for a study of the Bieble, the word of god.  Every week we wioll cover a chapter in the Bible. Questions and discussion are welcome. We take prayer requests and general discussion after the study. All are welcome!

nets.name: Beacon Net
nets.description: Net presented by the Silver Creek Amateur Radio Association in Northeast Ohio.  The net takes normal checkins and ask for answers to two trivia questions per net.

nets.name: Active Elements Wednesday HF Net
nets.description: Mid-week HF roundtable for the Active Elements community.

nets.name: Active Elements Friday Night HF Net
nets.description: Friday evening HF gathering for Active Elements operators.

nets.name: Blind Hams Iowa Net
nets.description: A net based in Iowa that takes check-ins from amateurs world wide but focusses on helping blind hams in Iowa. Checkins welcome from everywhere.

nets.name: The Blind Hams Digital Pace (Politics and Current Events) net
nets.description: The PACE net meets on the second and third Thursday of the week at 7 PM Eastern on the Blind Hams Digital Network. The PACE net is a roundtable net that discusses topics related to politics andcurrent events. We don't shy away from controversy and all topics are  welcome.

nets.name: The Blind Hams Network PACE (Politics and Current Events Net)
nets.description: A roundtable net that discusses topics in politics and current events. See the Blind Hams network page for the current topic(s).

nets.name: Science Net
nets.description: Science news, discussion and a little trivia
